page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox navigate method

argument.name: direction
argument.description: The direction to navigate. The value can be "prev", "next", 'home" or "first", "end" or "last", "page-prev" and "page-next".

argument.name: executeSelect
argument.description: Whether or not to execute the select events. The change event will always be executed when the value changes.

discussion.p: The list selection can be navigated by this method, in a similar fashion to keyboard navigation. The navigation directions of "page-prev" and "page-next" can be used when the view is dynamically paging data to move between pages of data.
